attributes.action: Stop paying for the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now time for us to stop paying for the Eurovision Song Contest as one of the big four!
After the block voting that now happens year in and year out in the yearly held, Eurovision Song contest, is it not about time that every country pays a substantial figure to the event instead of the big four. I believe that from this year on there will not be another chance for us to win the contest, so why should we fund other countires entertainment. 
It is not the fact that we send bad songs/performers, but due to the block voting, we will NOT win again!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
